message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. How about $120?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about $115? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
